data.title: Geneva School of Boerne in TX
data.meta_description: Explore reviews, rankings, SAT/ACT test scores, popular colleges, and statistics for Geneva School of Boerne in TX.
data.text:
The Geneva School of Boerne exists to provide a classical education from a biblical worldview, to equip students for a lifetime of learning, service and leadership to the glory of Jesus Christ.

The school is dedicated to a Christ-centered worldview and locking arms with parents to provide a rigorous and time-tested education. The award-winning and accredited academics, athletics and arts programs uphold the classical ideal by teaching students to recognize what is good, true and beautiful in every endeavor. Teaching from a Christ-centered worldview, everything we learn and do is evaluated according to the standard of Godâ€™s word. Geneva graduates enter the world well-spoken and uniquely equipped to lead as servants, scholars, athletes and artists.

The culture at Geneva is welcoming, fun, and genuine in a way that I as a student have seen no where else.
